## hashExecutable() function

Compute the SHA-256 digest of the file at `filePath`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function hashExecutable(filePath: string): Promise<string>;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Absolute or relative path to the binary to hash.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;string&gt;
